Comprehensive System Overview: This diagram visualizes your entire Monday.com workspace structure, including board relationships, column types, formulas, mirrors, automations, and team ownership. The diagram is optimized for export to draw.io for further editing.

üì• How to Use This Diagram in Draw.io:

  1. Click the "Download for Draw.io" button above to save the XML file

  3. Select "File" ‚Üí "Open from" ‚Üí "Device"
